TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessModuleCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: Provides a strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A module is an executable file or a dynamic link library (DLL). Each process consists of one or more modules. You can use this class to iterate over a collection of process modules on the system. A module is identified by its module name and fully qualified file path.
